io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.state

Interface BaseScaleState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BulletState, WorldEditor, WorldState

    public interface BaseScaleState
    An interface allowing a state to except a float scaling value.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void scale(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer container, float base)
      Scale the state to the specified scaling (1 == 100%).
